Detailed Description

This action clamps the particle to a node.

The node clamp PSA effectively moves the particle by the same displacement done to the node in the same update.

void NodeClampPSA::fullyClamp ( bool  f  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the fullClamp property of the NodeClampPSA.

This determines if all particles should be clamped to the relevant node.
